system.effect: Deploys countermeasures that for the next 1d5+1 turns causes all ships targeting this one to have -20 on BS Tests and all torpedos to have -30. Single use, once deployed requires successful upkeep test outside of combat at a suitable location such as a shipyard before it can be used again. One per Vessel.
